title: Extended numbers and projective lines as sets
content: We parameterize the set of infinite extended complex numbers ` CCinfty ` ( ~ df-bj-ccinfty ) using the real numbers ` RR ` ( ~ df-r ) via the function ` inftyexpitau ` . Since at that point, we have only defined the set of real numbers but no operations on it, we define a temporary "fractional part" function, which is more convenient to define on the temporary reals ` R. ` ( ~ df-nr ) since we can use operations on the latter. We also define the temporary real "one-half" in order to define minus infinity ( ~ df-bj-minfty ) and then we can define the sets of extended real numbers and of extended complex numbers, and the projective real and complex lines, as well as addition and negation on these, and also the order relation on the extended reals (which bypasses the intermediate definition of a temporary order on the real numbers and then a superseding one on the extended real numbers).

blocks.name: cfractemp
blocks.content: Syntax for the fractional part of a tempopary real.

blocks.name: df-bj-fractemp
blocks.content: Temporary definition: fractional part of a temporary real. To understand this definition, recall the canonical injection ` _om --> R. ` , ` n |-> [ { x e. Q. | x <Q <. suc n , 1o >. } , 1P ] ~R ` where we successively take the successor of ` n ` to land in positive integers, then take the couple with ` 1o ` as second component to land in positive rationals, then take the Dedekind cut that positive rational forms, and finally take the equivalence class of the couple with ` 1P ` as second component. Adding one at the beginning and subtracting it at the end is necessary since the constructions used in set.mm use the positive integers, positive rationals, and positive reals as intermediate number systems. (Contributed by BJ, 22-Jan-2023.) The precise definition is irrelevant and should generally not be used. One could even inline it. The definitive fractional part of an extended or projective complex number will be defined later. (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-bj-fractemp(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(cfractemp, cmpt(s0, cnr, crio(s1, cnr, wa(wo(wceq(cv(s1), c0r), wa(wbr(c0r, cltr, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), cltr, c1r))), wrex(s2, com, wceq(co(cec(cop(crab(s3, cnq, wbr(cv(s3), cltq, cop(csuc(cv(s2)), c1o))), c1p), cer), cplr, cv(s1)), cv(s0)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-bj-fractemp(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  ⊢ {R =(s0 ∈ ℝ± ↦ iota(s1 ∈ ℝ±,((s1 = 0 ∨(0[<]s1 ∧ s1[<]1))∧ ∃(s2 ∈ _om,([< { s3 ∈ ℚ+ | s3[<]< suc(s2), 1o > }, 1 >]~[+]s1)= s0))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
}

blocks.name: cinftyexpitau
blocks.content: Syntax for the function ` inftyexpitau ` parameterizing ` CCinfty ` .

blocks.name: df-bj-inftyexpitau
blocks.content: Definition of the auxiliary function ` inftyexpitau ` parameterizing the circle at infinity ` CCinfty ` in ` CCbar ` . We use coupling with ` { R. } ` to simplify the proof of ~ bj-inftyexpitaudisj . (Contributed by BJ, 22-Jan-2023.) The precise definition is irrelevant and should generally not be used. TODO: prove only the necessary lemmas to prove ` |- ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR ) -> ( ( inftyexpitau `` A ) = ` ` ( inftyexpitau `` B ) <-> ( A - B ) e. ZZ ) ) ` . (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: cccinftyN
blocks.content: Syntax for the circle at infinity ` CCinftyN ` .

blocks.name: df-bj-ccinftyN
blocks.content: Definition of the circle at infinity ` CCinftyN ` . (Contributed by BJ, 22-Jun-2019.) The precise definition is irrelevant and should generally not be used. (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: bj-inftyexpitaufo
blocks.content: The function ` inftyexpitau ` written as a surjection with domain and range. (Contributed by BJ, 4-Feb-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm bj-inftyexpitaufo() {
  |- wfo(cinftyexpitau, cr, cccinftyN)
} = {
  mpbi(wfo(cinftyexpitau, cr, cccinftyN), wfo(cinftyexpitau, cr, crn(cinftyexpitau)))
  mpbi(wfo(cinftyexpitau, cr, crn(cinftyexpitau)), wfn(cinftyexpitau, cr))
  fnmpti(hs0, cinftyexpitau, cr, cop(cfv(cfractemp, cfv(c1st, cv(hs0))), csn(cnr)))
  opex(cfv(cfractemp, cfv(c1st, cv(hs0))), csn(cnr))
  df-bj-inftyexpitau(hs0)
  dffn4(cinftyexpitau, cr)
  ax-mp(wb(wfo(cinftyexpitau, cr, crn(cinftyexpitau)), wfo(cinftyexpitau, cr, cccinftyN)), wceq(crn(cinftyexpitau), cccinftyN))
  eqcomi(crn(cinftyexpitau), cccinftyN)
  df-bj-ccinftyN()
  foeq3(crn(cinftyexpitau), cccinftyN, cinftyexpitau, cr)
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm bj-inftyexpitaufo() {
  ⊢ (inftyexpitau : ℝ ↠ CCinftyN)
} = {
  mpbi((inftyexpitau : ℝ ↠ CCinftyN), (inftyexpitau : ℝ ↠ ran(inftyexpitau)))
  mpbi((inftyexpitau : ℝ ↠ ran(inftyexpitau)), inftyexpitau[Fn]ℝ)
  fnmpti(hs0, cinftyexpitau, cr, <({ R `(1st ` hs0)), { ℝ± } >)
  opex(({ R `(1st ` hs0)), { ℝ± })
  df-bj-inftyexpitau(hs0)
  dffn4(cinftyexpitau, cr)
  ax-mp(((inftyexpitau : ℝ ↠ ran(inftyexpitau))↔(inftyexpitau : ℝ ↠ CCinftyN)), ran(inftyexpitau)= CCinftyN)
  eqcomi(ran(inftyexpitau), cccinftyN)
  df-bj-ccinftyN()
  foeq3(ran(inftyexpitau), cccinftyN, cinftyexpitau, cr)
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
}

blocks.name: chalf
blocks.content: Syntax for the temporary one-half.

blocks.name: df-bj-onehalf
blocks.content: Define the temporary real "one-half". Once the machinery is developed, the real number "one-half" is commonly denoted by ` ( 1 / 2 ) ` . (Contributed by BJ, 4-Feb-2023.) (New usage is discouraged.) TODO: $p |- 1/2 e. R. $= ? $. ( ~ riotacl ) $p |- -. 0R = 1/2 $= ? $. (since -. ( 0R +R 0R ) = 1R ) $p |- 0R <R 1/2 $= ? $. $p |- 1/2 <R 1R $= ? $. $p |- ( {R `` 0R ) = 0R $= ? $. $p |- ( {R `` 1/2 ) = 1/2 $= ? $. df-minfty $a |- minfty = ( inftyexpitau `` <. 1/2 , 0R >. ) $.

blocks.name: bj-inftyexpitaudisj
blocks.content: An element of the circle at infinity is not a complex number. (Contributed by BJ, 4-Feb-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm bj-inftyexpitaudisj(class c0) {
  |- wn(wcel(cfv(cinftyexpitau, c0), cc))
} = {
  pm2.61i(wn(wcel(cfv(cinftyexpitau, c0), cc)), wcel(c0, cdm(cinftyexpitau)))
  syl(wcel(c0, cdm(cinftyexpitau)), wn(wcel(cfv(cinftyexpitau, c0), cc)), wceq(cfv(cinftyexpitau, c0), cop(cfv(cfractemp, cfv(c1st, c0)), csn(cnr))))
  eleq2s(c0, cdm(cinftyexpitau), cr, wceq(cfv(cinftyexpitau, c0), cop(cfv(cfractemp, cfv(c1st, c0)), csn(cnr))))
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, cr, cinftyexpitau, cop(cfv(cfractemp, cfv(c1st, c0)), csn(cnr)), cop(cfv(cfractemp, cfv(c1st, cv(hs0))), csn(cnr)))
  opeq1d(cfv(cfractemp, cfv(c1st, cv(hs0))), csn(cnr), cfv(cfractemp, cfv(c1st, c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  2fveq3(cv(hs0), c0, cfractemp, c1st)
  df-bj-inftyexpitau(hs0)
  opex(cfv(cfractemp, cfv(c1st, c0)), csn(cnr))
  dmmpti(hs1, cinftyexpitau, cr, cop(cfv(cfractemp, cfv(c1st, cv(hs1))), csn(cnr)))
  opex(cfv(cfractemp, cfv(c1st, cv(hs1))), csn(cnr))
  df-bj-inftyexpitau(hs1)
  mtbii(wceq(cfv(cinftyexpitau, c0), cop(cfv(cfractemp, cfv(c1st, c0)), csn(cnr))), wcel(cfv(cinftyexpitau, c0), cc), wcel(cop(cfv(cfractemp, cfv(c1st, c0)), csn(cnr)), cc))
  mtbir(wcel(cop(cfv(cfractemp, cfv(c1st, c0)), csn(cnr)), cc), wcel(cop(cfv(cfractemp, cfv(c1st, c0)), csn(cnr)), cxp(cnr, cnr)))
  mtbir(wcel(cop(cfv(cfractemp, cfv(c1st, c0)), csn(cnr)), cxp(cnr, cnr)), wa(wcel(cfv(cfractemp, cfv(c1st, c0)), cnr), wcel(csn(cnr), cnr)))
  intnan(wcel(cfv(cfractemp, cfv(c1st, c0)), cnr), wcel(csn(cnr), cnr))
  ax-mp(wn(wcel(csn(cnr), cnr)), wcel(cnr, universe))
  nrex1()
  bj-nsnid(cnr, universe)
  opelxp(cfv(cfractemp, cfv(c1st, c0)), csn(cnr), cnr, cnr)
  eleq2i(cop(cfv(cfractemp, cfv(c1st, c0)), csn(cnr)), cc, cxp(cnr, cnr))
  df-c()
  eleq1d(cop(cfv(cfractemp, cfv(c1st, c0)), csn(cnr)), cc, cfv(cinftyexpitau, c0), wceq(cfv(cinftyexpitau, c0), cop(cfv(cfractemp, cfv(c1st, c0)), csn(cnr))))
  biimpi(wceq(cfv(cinftyexpitau, c0), cop(cfv(cfractemp, cfv(c1st, c0)), csn(cnr))), wceq(cop(cfv(cfractemp, cfv(c1st, c0)), csn(cnr)), cfv(cinftyexpitau, c0)))
  eqcom(cfv(cinftyexpitau, c0), cop(cfv(cfractemp, cfv(c1st, c0)), csn(cnr)))
  mtbiri(wn(wcel(c0, cdm(cinftyexpitau))), wcel(cfv(cinftyexpitau, c0), cc), wcel(emptycls, cc))
  0ncn()
  eleq1d(cfv(cinftyexpitau, c0), cc, emptycls, wn(wcel(c0, cdm(cinftyexpitau))))
  ndmfv(c0, cinftyexpitau)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
  diff.hs0.c(cop(cfv(cfractemp, cfv(c1st, c0)), csn(cnr)))
  diff.hs1.c(cr)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm bj-inftyexpitaudisj(class c0) {
  ⊢ ¬(inftyexpitau ` c0)∈ ℂ
} = {
  pm2.61i(¬(inftyexpitau ` c0)∈ ℂ, c0 ∈ dom(inftyexpitau))
  syl(c0 ∈ dom(inftyexpitau), ¬(inftyexpitau ` c0)∈ ℂ, (inftyexpitau ` c0)= <({ R `(1st ` c0)), { ℝ± } >)
  eleq2s(c0, dom(inftyexpitau), cr, (inftyexpitau ` c0)= <({ R `(1st ` c0)), { ℝ± } >)
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, cr, cinftyexpitau, <({ R `(1st ` c0)), { ℝ± } >, <({ R `(1st ` hs0)), { ℝ± } >)
  opeq1d(({ R `(1st ` hs0)), { ℝ± }, ({ R `(1st ` c0)), hs0 = c0)
  2fveq3(hs0, c0, cfractemp, c1st)
  df-bj-inftyexpitau(hs0)
  opex(({ R `(1st ` c0)), { ℝ± })
  dmmpti(hs1, cinftyexpitau, cr, <({ R `(1st ` hs1)), { ℝ± } >)
  opex(({ R `(1st ` hs1)), { ℝ± })
  df-bj-inftyexpitau(hs1)
  mtbii((inftyexpitau ` c0)= <({ R `(1st ` c0)), { ℝ± } >, (inftyexpitau ` c0)∈ ℂ, <({ R `(1st ` c0)), { ℝ± } > ∈ ℂ)
  mtbir(<({ R `(1st ` c0)), { ℝ± } > ∈ ℂ, <({ R `(1st ` c0)), { ℝ± } > ∈(ℝ± × ℝ±))
  mtbir(<({ R `(1st ` c0)), { ℝ± } > ∈(ℝ± × ℝ±), (({ R `(1st ` c0))∈ ℝ± ∧ { ℝ± } ∈ ℝ±))
  intnan(({ R `(1st ` c0))∈ ℝ±, { ℝ± } ∈ ℝ±)
  ax-mp(¬ { ℝ± } ∈ ℝ±, ℝ± ∈ 𝕌)
  nrex1()
  bj-nsnid(cnr, universe)
  opelxp(({ R `(1st ` c0)), { ℝ± }, cnr, cnr)
  eleq2i(<({ R `(1st ` c0)), { ℝ± } >, cc, (ℝ± × ℝ±))
  df-c()
  eleq1d(<({ R `(1st ` c0)), { ℝ± } >, cc, (inftyexpitau ` c0), (inftyexpitau ` c0)= <({ R `(1st ` c0)), { ℝ± } >)
  biimpi((inftyexpitau ` c0)= <({ R `(1st ` c0)), { ℝ± } >, <({ R `(1st ` c0)), { ℝ± } > =(inftyexpitau ` c0))
  eqcom((inftyexpitau ` c0), <({ R `(1st ` c0)), { ℝ± } >)
  mtbiri(¬ c0 ∈ dom(inftyexpitau), (inftyexpitau ` c0)∈ ℂ, ∅ ∈ ℂ)
  0ncn()
  eleq1d((inftyexpitau ` c0), cc, emptycls, ¬ c0 ∈ dom(inftyexpitau))
  ndmfv(c0, cinftyexpitau)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
  diff.hs0.c(<({ R `(1st ` c0)), { ℝ± } >)
  diff.hs1.c(cr)
}

blocks.name: cinftyexpi
blocks.content: Syntax for the function ` inftyexpi ` parameterizing ` CCinfty ` .

blocks.name: df-bj-inftyexpi
blocks.content: Definition of the auxiliary function ` inftyexpi ` parameterizing the circle at infinity ` CCinfty ` in ` CCbar ` . We use coupling with ` CC ` to simplify the proof of ~ bj-ccinftydisj . It could seem more natural to define ` inftyexpi ` on all of ` RR ` , but we want to use only basic functions in the definition of ` CCbar ` . TODO: transition to ~ df-bj-inftyexpitau instead. (Contributed by BJ, 22-Jun-2019.) The precise definition is irrelevant and should generally not be used. (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: bj-inftyexpiinv
blocks.content: Utility theorem for the inverse of ` inftyexpi ` . (Contributed by BJ, 22-Jun-2019.) This utility theorem is irrelevant and should generally not be used. (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm bj-inftyexpiinv(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, co(cneg(cpi), cioc, cpi)), wceq(cfv(c1st, cfv(cinftyexpi, c0)), c0))
} = {
  eqtrd(cfv(c1st, cfv(cinftyexpi, c0)), c0, cfv(c1st, cop(c0, cc)), wcel(c0, co(cneg(cpi), cioc, cpi)))
  fveq2d(c1st, cfv(cinftyexpi, c0), cop(c0, cc), wcel(c0, co(cneg(cpi), cioc, cpi)))
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, co(cneg(cpi), cioc, cpi), cinftyexpi, cop(c0, cc), cop(cv(hs0), cc))
  opeq1(cv(hs0), c0, cc)
  df-bj-inftyexpi(hs0)
  opex(c0, cc)
  mpan2(wcel(c0, co(cneg(cpi), cioc, cpi)), wceq(cfv(c1st, cop(c0, cc)), c0), wcel(cc, universe))
  cnex()
  op1stg(c0, co(cneg(cpi), cioc, cpi), cc, universe)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(co(cneg(cpi), cioc, cpi))
  diff.hs0.c(cop(c0, cc))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm bj-inftyexpiinv(class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈(-u(π)[(,]]π)→(1st `(inftyexpi ` c0))= c0)
} = {
  eqtrd((1st `(inftyexpi ` c0)), c0, (1st ` < c0, ℂ >), c0 ∈(-u(π)[(,]]π))
  fveq2d(c1st, (inftyexpi ` c0), < c0, ℂ >, c0 ∈(-u(π)[(,]]π))
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, (-u(π)[(,]]π), cinftyexpi, < c0, ℂ >, < hs0, ℂ >)
  opeq1(hs0, c0, cc)
  df-bj-inftyexpi(hs0)
  opex(c0, cc)
  mpan2(c0 ∈(-u(π)[(,]]π), (1st ` < c0, ℂ >)= c0, ℂ ∈ 𝕌)
  cnex()
  op1stg(c0, (-u(π)[(,]]π), cc, universe)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((-u(π)[(,]]π))
  diff.hs0.c(< c0, ℂ >)
}

blocks.name: bj-inftyexpiinj
blocks.content: Injectivity of the parameterization ` inftyexpi ` . Remark: a more conceptual proof would use ~ bj-inftyexpiinv and the fact that a function with a retraction is injective. (Contributed by BJ, 22-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm bj-inftyexpiinj(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, co(cneg(cpi), cioc, cpi)), wcel(c1, co(cneg(cpi), cioc, cpi))), wb(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(cinftyexpi, c0), cfv(cinftyexpi, c1))))
} = {
  impbid2(wa(wcel(c0, co(cneg(cpi), cioc, cpi)), wcel(c1, co(cneg(cpi), cioc, cpi))), wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(cinftyexpi, c0), cfv(cinftyexpi, c1)))
  fveq2(c0, c1, cinftyexpi)
  syl5(wa(wcel(c0, co(cneg(cpi), cioc, cpi)), wcel(c1, co(cneg(cpi), cioc, cpi))), wceq(cfv(cinftyexpi, c0), cfv(cinftyexpi, c1)), wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c1st, cfv(cinftyexpi, c0)), cfv(c1st, cfv(cinftyexpi, c1))))
  fveq2(cfv(cinftyexpi, c0), cfv(cinftyexpi, c1), c1st)
  sylibd(wa(wcel(c0, co(cneg(cpi), cioc, cpi)), wcel(c1, co(cneg(cpi), cioc, cpi))), wceq(cfv(c1st, cfv(cinftyexpi, c0)), cfv(c1st, cfv(cinftyexpi, c1))), wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c0, cfv(c1st, cfv(cinftyexpi, c1))))
  biimpd(wa(wcel(c0, co(cneg(cpi), cioc, cpi)), wcel(c1, co(cneg(cpi), cioc, cpi))), wceq(cfv(c1st, cfv(cinftyexpi, c0)), cfv(c1st, cfv(cinftyexpi, c1))), wceq(c0, cfv(c1st, cfv(cinftyexpi, c1))))
  eqeq1d(cfv(c1st, cfv(cinftyexpi, c0)), cfv(c1st, cfv(cinftyexpi, c1)), c0, wa(wcel(c0, co(cneg(cpi), cioc, cpi)), wcel(c1, co(cneg(cpi), cioc, cpi))))
  adantr(wcel(c0, co(cneg(cpi), cioc, cpi)), wcel(c1, co(cneg(cpi), cioc, cpi)), wceq(cfv(c1st, cfv(cinftyexpi, c0)), c0))
  bj-inftyexpiinv(c0)
  eqeq2d(c0, cfv(c1st, cfv(cinftyexpi, c1)), c1, wa(wcel(c0, co(cneg(cpi), cioc, cpi)), wcel(c1, co(cneg(cpi), cioc, cpi))))
  adantl(wcel(c0, co(cneg(cpi), cioc, cpi)), wcel(c1, co(cneg(cpi), cioc, cpi)), wceq(cfv(c1st, cfv(cinftyexpi, c1)), c1))
  bj-inftyexpiinv(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm bj-inftyexpiinj(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈(-u(π)[(,]]π)∧ c1 ∈(-u(π)[(,]]π))→(c0 = c1 ↔(inftyexpi ` c0)=(inftyexpi ` c1)))
} = {
  impbid2((c0 ∈(-u(π)[(,]]π)∧ c1 ∈(-u(π)[(,]]π)), c0 = c1, (inftyexpi ` c0)=(inftyexpi ` c1))
  fveq2(c0, c1, cinftyexpi)
  syl5((c0 ∈(-u(π)[(,]]π)∧ c1 ∈(-u(π)[(,]]π)), (inftyexpi ` c0)=(inftyexpi ` c1), c0 = c1, (1st `(inftyexpi ` c0))=(1st `(inftyexpi ` c1)))
  fveq2((inftyexpi ` c0), (inftyexpi ` c1), c1st)
  sylibd((c0 ∈(-u(π)[(,]]π)∧ c1 ∈(-u(π)[(,]]π)), (1st `(inftyexpi ` c0))=(1st `(inftyexpi ` c1)), c0 = c1, c0 =(1st `(inftyexpi ` c1)))
  biimpd((c0 ∈(-u(π)[(,]]π)∧ c1 ∈(-u(π)[(,]]π)), (1st `(inftyexpi ` c0))=(1st `(inftyexpi ` c1)), c0 =(1st `(inftyexpi ` c1)))
  eqeq1d((1st `(inftyexpi ` c0)), (1st `(inftyexpi ` c1)), c0, (c0 ∈(-u(π)[(,]]π)∧ c1 ∈(-u(π)[(,]]π)))
  adantr(c0 ∈(-u(π)[(,]]π), c1 ∈(-u(π)[(,]]π), (1st `(inftyexpi ` c0))= c0)
  bj-inftyexpiinv(c0)
  eqeq2d(c0, (1st `(inftyexpi ` c1)), c1, (c0 ∈(-u(π)[(,]]π)∧ c1 ∈(-u(π)[(,]]π)))
  adantl(c0 ∈(-u(π)[(,]]π), c1 ∈(-u(π)[(,]]π), (1st `(inftyexpi ` c1))= c1)
  bj-inftyexpiinv(c1)
}

blocks.name: bj-inftyexpidisj
blocks.content: An element of the circle at infinity is not a complex number. (Contributed by BJ, 22-Jun-2019.) This utility theorem is irrelevant and should generally not be used. (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm bj-inftyexpidisj(class c0) {
  |- wn(wcel(cfv(cinftyexpi, c0), cc))
} = {
  pm2.61i(wn(wcel(cfv(cinftyexpi, c0), cc)), wcel(c0, cdm(cinftyexpi)))
  syl(wcel(c0, cdm(cinftyexpi)), wn(wcel(cfv(cinftyexpi, c0), cc)), wceq(cfv(cinftyexpi, c0), cop(c0, cc)))
  eleq2s(c0, cdm(cinftyexpi), co(cneg(cpi), cioc, cpi), wceq(cfv(cinftyexpi, c0), cop(c0, cc)))
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, co(cneg(cpi), cioc, cpi), cinftyexpi, cop(c0, cc), cop(cv(hs0), cc))
  opeq1(cv(hs0), c0, cc)
  opex(c0, cc)
  dmmpti(hs0, cinftyexpi, co(cneg(cpi), cioc, cpi), cop(cv(hs0), cc))
  opex(cv(hs0), cc)
  df-bj-inftyexpi(hs0)
  mtbii(wceq(cfv(cinftyexpi, c0), cop(c0, cc)), wcel(cfv(cinftyexpi, c0), cc), wcel(cop(c0, cc), cc))
  pm2.61i(wn(wcel(cop(c0, cc), cc)), wcel(c0, universe))
  sylancr(wcel(c0, universe), wn(wcel(cop(c0, cc), cc)), wcel(cc, cpr(c0, cc)), wcel(cpr(c0, cc), cop(c0, cc)))
  prid2(cc, c0)
  mpbiri(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(cpr(c0, cc), cop(c0, cc)), wo(wceq(cpr(c0, cc), csn(c0)), wceq(cpr(c0, cc), cpr(c0, cc))))
  olci(wceq(cpr(c0, cc), csn(c0)), wceq(cpr(c0, cc), cpr(c0, cc)))
  eqid(cpr(c0, cc))
  mpan2(wcel(c0, universe), wb(wcel(cpr(c0, cc), cop(c0, cc)), wo(wceq(cpr(c0, cc), csn(c0)), wceq(cpr(c0, cc), cpr(c0, cc)))), wcel(cc, universe))
  cnex()
  elopg(c0, universe, cc, universe, cpr(c0, cc))
  bj-imn3ani(wcel(cc, cpr(c0, cc)), wcel(cpr(c0, cc), cop(c0, cc)), wcel(cop(c0, cc), cc))
  en3lp(cc, cpr(c0, cc), cop(c0, cc))
  syl(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wn(wcel(cop(c0, cc), cc)), wceq(cop(c0, cc), emptycls))
  opprc1(c0, cc)
  mtbiri(wceq(cop(c0, cc), emptycls), wcel(cop(c0, cc), cc), wcel(emptycls, cc))
  eleq1(cop(c0, cc), emptycls, cc)
  eleq1d(cop(c0, cc), cc, cfv(cinftyexpi, c0), wceq(cfv(cinftyexpi, c0), cop(c0, cc)))
  biimpi(wceq(cfv(cinftyexpi, c0), cop(c0, cc)), wceq(cop(c0, cc), cfv(cinftyexpi, c0)))
  eqcom(cfv(cinftyexpi, c0), cop(c0, cc))
  mtbiri(wn(wcel(c0, cdm(cinftyexpi))), wcel(cfv(cinftyexpi, c0), cc), wcel(emptycls, cc))
  0ncn()
  eleq1d(cfv(cinftyexpi, c0), cc, emptycls, wn(wcel(c0, cdm(cinftyexpi))))
  ndmfv(c0, cinftyexpi)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(co(cneg(cpi), cioc, cpi))
  diff.hs0.c(cop(c0, cc))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm bj-inftyexpidisj(class c0) {
  ⊢ ¬(inftyexpi ` c0)∈ ℂ
} = {
  pm2.61i(¬(inftyexpi ` c0)∈ ℂ, c0 ∈ dom(inftyexpi))
  syl(c0 ∈ dom(inftyexpi), ¬(inftyexpi ` c0)∈ ℂ, (inftyexpi ` c0)= < c0, ℂ >)
  eleq2s(c0, dom(inftyexpi), (-u(π)[(,]]π), (inftyexpi ` c0)= < c0, ℂ >)
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, (-u(π)[(,]]π), cinftyexpi, < c0, ℂ >, < hs0, ℂ >)
  opeq1(hs0, c0, cc)
  opex(c0, cc)
  dmmpti(hs0, cinftyexpi, (-u(π)[(,]]π), < hs0, ℂ >)
  opex(hs0, cc)
  df-bj-inftyexpi(hs0)
  mtbii((inftyexpi ` c0)= < c0, ℂ >, (inftyexpi ` c0)∈ ℂ, < c0, ℂ > ∈ ℂ)
  pm2.61i(¬ < c0, ℂ > ∈ ℂ, c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  sylancr(c0 ∈ 𝕌, ¬ < c0, ℂ > ∈ ℂ, ℂ ∈ { c0, ℂ }, { c0, ℂ } ∈ < c0, ℂ >)
  prid2(cc, c0)
  mpbiri(c0 ∈ 𝕌, { c0, ℂ } ∈ < c0, ℂ >, ({ c0, ℂ } = { c0 } ∨ { c0, ℂ } = { c0, ℂ }))
  olci({ c0, ℂ } = { c0 }, { c0, ℂ } = { c0, ℂ })
  eqid({ c0, ℂ })
  mpan2(c0 ∈ 𝕌, ({ c0, ℂ } ∈ < c0, ℂ > ↔({ c0, ℂ } = { c0 } ∨ { c0, ℂ } = { c0, ℂ })), ℂ ∈ 𝕌)
  cnex()
  elopg(c0, universe, cc, universe, { c0, ℂ })
  bj-imn3ani(ℂ ∈ { c0, ℂ }, { c0, ℂ } ∈ < c0, ℂ >, < c0, ℂ > ∈ ℂ)
  en3lp(cc, { c0, ℂ }, < c0, ℂ >)
  syl(¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌, ¬ < c0, ℂ > ∈ ℂ, < c0, ℂ > = ∅)
  opprc1(c0, cc)
  mtbiri(< c0, ℂ > = ∅, < c0, ℂ > ∈ ℂ, ∅ ∈ ℂ)
  eleq1(< c0, ℂ >, emptycls, cc)
  eleq1d(< c0, ℂ >, cc, (inftyexpi ` c0), (inftyexpi ` c0)= < c0, ℂ >)
  biimpi((inftyexpi ` c0)= < c0, ℂ >, < c0, ℂ > =(inftyexpi ` c0))
  eqcom((inftyexpi ` c0), < c0, ℂ >)
  mtbiri(¬ c0 ∈ dom(inftyexpi), (inftyexpi ` c0)∈ ℂ, ∅ ∈ ℂ)
  0ncn()
  eleq1d((inftyexpi ` c0), cc, emptycls, ¬ c0 ∈ dom(inftyexpi))
  ndmfv(c0, cinftyexpi)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((-u(π)[(,]]π))
  diff.hs0.c(< c0, ℂ >)
}

blocks.name: cccinfty
blocks.content: Syntax for the circle at infinity ` CCinfty ` .

blocks.name: df-bj-ccinfty
blocks.content: Definition of the circle at infinity ` CCinfty ` . (Contributed by BJ, 22-Jun-2019.) The precise definition is irrelevant and should generally not be used. (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: bj-ccinftydisj
blocks.content: The circle at infinity is disjoint from the set of complex numbers. (Contributed by BJ, 22-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm bj-ccinftydisj() {
  |- wceq(cin(cc, cccinfty), emptycls)
} = {
  nel0(hs0, cin(cc, cccinfty))
  mto(wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cc, cccinfty)), wex(hs1, wcel(cfv(cinftyexpi, cv(hs1)), cc)))
  nex(hs1, wcel(cfv(cinftyexpi, cv(hs1)), cc))
  bj-inftyexpidisj(cv(hs1))
  syl(wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cc, cccinfty)), wex(hs1, wcel(cfv(cinftyexpi, cv(hs1)), cc)), wex(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(cinftyexpi, cv(hs1))))))
  syl(wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cc, cccinfty)), wex(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(cinftyexpi, cv(hs1))))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wex(hs1, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(cinftyexpi, cv(hs1))))))
  sylbi(wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cc, cccinfty)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wex(hs1, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(cinftyexpi, cv(hs1))))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(cv(hs0), cccinfty)))
  elin(cv(hs0), cc, cccinfty)
  anim2i(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(cv(hs0), cccinfty), wex(hs1, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(cinftyexpi, cv(hs1)))))
  eleq2s(cv(hs0), cccinfty, crn(cinftyexpi), wex(hs1, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(cinftyexpi, cv(hs1)))))
  syl(wcel(cv(hs0), crn(cinftyexpi)), wex(hs1, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(cinftyexpi, cv(hs1)))), wrex(hs1, cdm(cinftyexpi), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(cinftyexpi, cv(hs1)))))
  ax-mp(wi(wcel(cv(hs0), crn(cinftyexpi)), wrex(hs1, cdm(cinftyexpi), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(cinftyexpi, cv(hs1))))), wfun(cinftyexpi))
  funmpt2(hs2, cinftyexpi, co(cneg(cpi), cioc, cpi), cop(cv(hs2), cc))
  df-bj-inftyexpi(hs2)
  elrnrexdm(hs1, cinftyexpi, cv(hs0))
  rexex(hs1, cdm(cinftyexpi), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(cinftyexpi, cv(hs1))))
  df-bj-ccinfty()
  sylbb2(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wex(hs1, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(cinftyexpi, cv(hs1))))), wex(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(cinftyexpi, cv(hs1))))), wa(wex(hs1, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(cinftyexpi, cv(hs1)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cc)))
  ancom(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wex(hs1, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(cinftyexpi, cv(hs1)))))
  bitri(wex(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(cinftyexpi, cv(hs1))))), wa(wex(hs1, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(cinftyexpi, cv(hs1)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cc)), wex(hs1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(cinftyexpi, cv(hs1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cc))))
  exancom(hs1, wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(cinftyexpi, cv(hs1))))
  19.41v(hs1, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(cinftyexpi, cv(hs1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cc))
  eximi(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(cinftyexpi, cv(hs1)))), wcel(cfv(cinftyexpi, cv(hs1)), cc))
  biimpac(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(cinftyexpi, cv(hs1))), wcel(cfv(cinftyexpi, cv(hs1)), cc))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), cfv(cinftyexpi, cv(hs1)), cc)
  diff.hs0.c(cin(cc, cccinfty))
  diff.hs1.c(cinftyexpi)
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(cv(hs0), cc))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm bj-ccinftydisj() {
  ⊢ (ℂ ⋂ CCinfty)= ∅
} = {
  nel0(hs0, (ℂ ⋂ CCinfty))
  mto(hs0 ∈(ℂ ⋂ CCinfty), ∃(hs1,(inftyexpi ` hs1)∈ ℂ))
  nex(hs1, (inftyexpi ` hs1)∈ ℂ)
  bj-inftyexpidisj(hs1)
  syl(hs0 ∈(ℂ ⋂ CCinfty), ∃(hs1,(inftyexpi ` hs1)∈ ℂ), ∃(hs1,(hs0 ∈ ℂ ∧ hs0 =(inftyexpi ` hs1))))
  syl(hs0 ∈(ℂ ⋂ CCinfty), ∃(hs1,(hs0 ∈ ℂ ∧ hs0 =(inftyexpi ` hs1))), (hs0 ∈ ℂ ∧ ∃(hs1, hs0 =(inftyexpi ` hs1))))
  sylbi(hs0 ∈(ℂ ⋂ CCinfty), (hs0 ∈ ℂ ∧ ∃(hs1, hs0 =(inftyexpi ` hs1))), (hs0 ∈ ℂ ∧ hs0 ∈ CCinfty))
  elin(hs0, cc, cccinfty)
  anim2i(hs0 ∈ ℂ, hs0 ∈ CCinfty, ∃(hs1, hs0 =(inftyexpi ` hs1)))
  eleq2s(hs0, cccinfty, ran(inftyexpi), ∃(hs1, hs0 =(inftyexpi ` hs1)))
  syl(hs0 ∈ ran(inftyexpi), ∃(hs1, hs0 =(inftyexpi ` hs1)), ∃(hs1 ∈ dom(inftyexpi), hs0 =(inftyexpi ` hs1)))
  ax-mp((hs0 ∈ ran(inftyexpi)→ ∃(hs1 ∈ dom(inftyexpi), hs0 =(inftyexpi ` hs1))), Fun(inftyexpi))
  funmpt2(hs2, cinftyexpi, (-u(π)[(,]]π), < hs2, ℂ >)
  df-bj-inftyexpi(hs2)
  elrnrexdm(hs1, cinftyexpi, hs0)
  rexex(hs1, dom(inftyexpi), hs0 =(inftyexpi ` hs1))
  df-bj-ccinfty()
  sylbb2((hs0 ∈ ℂ ∧ ∃(hs1, hs0 =(inftyexpi ` hs1))), ∃(hs1,(hs0 ∈ ℂ ∧ hs0 =(inftyexpi ` hs1))), (∃(hs1, hs0 =(inftyexpi ` hs1))∧ hs0 ∈ ℂ))
  ancom(hs0 ∈ ℂ, ∃(hs1, hs0 =(inftyexpi ` hs1)))
  bitri(∃(hs1,(hs0 ∈ ℂ ∧ hs0 =(inftyexpi ` hs1))), (∃(hs1, hs0 =(inftyexpi ` hs1))∧ hs0 ∈ ℂ), ∃(hs1,(hs0 =(inftyexpi ` hs1)∧ hs0 ∈ ℂ)))
  exancom(hs1, hs0 ∈ ℂ, hs0 =(inftyexpi ` hs1))
  19.41v(hs1, hs0 =(inftyexpi ` hs1), hs0 ∈ ℂ)
  eximi(hs1, (hs0 ∈ ℂ ∧ hs0 =(inftyexpi ` hs1)), (inftyexpi ` hs1)∈ ℂ)
  biimpac(hs0 ∈ ℂ, hs0 =(inftyexpi ` hs1), (inftyexpi ` hs1)∈ ℂ)
  eleq1(hs0, (inftyexpi ` hs1), cc)
  diff.hs0.c((ℂ ⋂ CCinfty))
  diff.hs1.c(cinftyexpi)
  diff.hs1.c(hs0)
  diff.hs1.w(hs0 ∈ ℂ)
}

blocks.name: bj-elccinfty
blocks.content: A lemma for infinite extended complex numbers. (Contributed by BJ, 27-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm bj-elccinfty(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, co(cneg(cpi), cioc, cpi)), wcel(cfv(cinftyexpi, c0), cccinfty))
} = {
  3syl(wcel(c0, co(cneg(cpi), cioc, cpi)), wcel(cfv(cinftyexpi, c0), cccinfty), wa(wfun(cinftyexpi), wcel(c0, cdm(cinftyexpi))), wcel(cfv(cinftyexpi, c0), crn(cinftyexpi)))
  eleq2s(c0, co(cneg(cpi), cioc, cpi), cdm(cinftyexpi), wa(wfun(cinftyexpi), wcel(c0, cdm(cinftyexpi))))
  jctl(wcel(c0, cdm(cinftyexpi)), wfun(cinftyexpi))
  funmpt2(hs0, cinftyexpi, co(cneg(cpi), cioc, cpi), cop(cv(hs0), cc))
  eqcomi(co(cneg(cpi), cioc, cpi), cdm(cinftyexpi))
  dmmpti(hs0, cinftyexpi, co(cneg(cpi), cioc, cpi), cop(cv(hs0), cc))
  opex(cv(hs0), cc)
  df-bj-inftyexpi(hs0)
  fvelrn(cinftyexpi, c0)
  biimpi(wcel(cfv(cinftyexpi, c0), crn(cinftyexpi)), wcel(cfv(cinftyexpi, c0), cccinfty))
  eleq2i(cfv(cinftyexpi, c0), crn(cinftyexpi), cccinfty)
  eqcomi(crn(cinftyexpi), cccinfty)
  df-bj-ccinfty()
  diff.hs0.c(co(cneg(cpi), cioc, cpi))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm bj-elccinfty(class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈(-u(π)[(,]]π)→(inftyexpi ` c0)∈ CCinfty)
} = {
  3syl(c0 ∈(-u(π)[(,]]π), (inftyexpi ` c0)∈ CCinfty, (Fun(inftyexpi)∧ c0 ∈ dom(inftyexpi)), (inftyexpi ` c0)∈ ran(inftyexpi))
  eleq2s(c0, (-u(π)[(,]]π), dom(inftyexpi), (Fun(inftyexpi)∧ c0 ∈ dom(inftyexpi)))
  jctl(c0 ∈ dom(inftyexpi), Fun(inftyexpi))
  funmpt2(hs0, cinftyexpi, (-u(π)[(,]]π), < hs0, ℂ >)
  eqcomi((-u(π)[(,]]π), dom(inftyexpi))
  dmmpti(hs0, cinftyexpi, (-u(π)[(,]]π), < hs0, ℂ >)
  opex(hs0, cc)
  df-bj-inftyexpi(hs0)
  fvelrn(cinftyexpi, c0)
  biimpi((inftyexpi ` c0)∈ ran(inftyexpi), (inftyexpi ` c0)∈ CCinfty)
  eleq2i((inftyexpi ` c0), ran(inftyexpi), cccinfty)
  eqcomi(ran(inftyexpi), cccinfty)
  df-bj-ccinfty()
  diff.hs0.c((-u(π)[(,]]π))
}

  breqtri(cneg(cpi), clt, nat0, cneg(nat0))
  mpbi(wbr(cneg(cpi), clt, cneg(nat0)), wbr(nat0, clt, cpi))

  0re()

  rexri(cneg(cpi))

  elioc2(cneg(cpi), cpi, nat0)

thm bj-pinftynminfty() {
  |- wne(cpinfty, cminfty)
} = {
  neir(cpinfty, cminfty)
  mtbir(wceq(cpinfty, cminfty), wceq(cfv(cinftyexpi, nat0), cminfty))
  mtbir(wceq(cfv(cinftyexpi, nat0), cminfty), wceq(cfv(cinftyexpi, nat0), cfv(cinftyexpi, cpi)))
  mtbi(wceq(cfv(cinftyexpi, nat0), cfv(cinftyexpi, cpi)), wceq(nat0, cpi))
  nesymi(nat0, cpi)
  gt0ne0ii(cpi)
  mp2an(wb(wceq(nat0, cpi), wceq(cfv(cinftyexpi, nat0), cfv(cinftyexpi, cpi))), wcel(nat0, co(cneg(cpi), cioc, cpi)), wcel(cpi, co(cneg(cpi), cioc, cpi)))
  mp2an(wcel(nat0, co(cneg(cpi), cioc, cpi)), wcel(cneg(cpi), cxr), wcel(cpi, cr))
  mpbir3and(wa(wcel(cneg(cpi), cxr), wcel(cpi, cr)), wcel(nat0, co(cneg(cpi), cioc, cpi)), wcel(nat0, cr), wbr(cneg(cpi), clt, nat0), wbr(nat0, cle, cpi))
  0red(wa(wcel(cneg(cpi), cxr), wcel(cpi, cr)))
  a1i(wa(wcel(cneg(cpi), cxr), wcel(cpi, cr)), wbr(cneg(cpi), clt, nat0))
  a1i(wa(wcel(cneg(cpi), cxr), wcel(cpi, cr)), wbr(nat0, cle, cpi))
  ltleii(nat0, cpi)
  elioc2(cneg(cpi), cpi, nat0)
  mp2an(wcel(cpi, co(cneg(cpi), cioc, cpi)), wcel(cneg(cpi), cxr), wcel(cpi, cr))
  rexri(cneg(cpi))
  mpbir3and(wa(wcel(cneg(cpi), cxr), wcel(cpi, cr)), wcel(cpi, co(cneg(cpi), cioc, cpi)), wcel(cpi, cr), wbr(cneg(cpi), clt, cpi), wbr(cpi, cle, cpi))
  simpr(wcel(cneg(cpi), cxr), wcel(cpi, cr))
  a1i(wa(wcel(cneg(cpi), cxr), wcel(cpi, cr)), wbr(cneg(cpi), clt, cpi))
  mp2an(wbr(cneg(cpi), clt, cpi), wbr(cneg(cpi), clt, nat0), wbr(nat0, clt, cpi))
  mpbi(wbr(cneg(cpi), clt, nat0), wbr(nat0, clt, cpi))
  ax-mp(wb(wbr(nat0, clt, cpi), wbr(cneg(cpi), clt, nat0)), wcel(cpi, cr))
  lt0neg2(cpi)
  pipos()
  lttri(cneg(cpi), nat0, cpi)
  renegcli(cpi)
  0re()
  a1i(wa(wcel(cneg(cpi), cxr), wcel(cpi, cr)), wbr(cpi, cle, cpi))
  leidi(cpi)
  pire()
  elioc2(cneg(cpi), cpi, cpi)
  bj-inftyexpiinj(nat0, cpi)
  eqeq2i(cfv(cinftyexpi, nat0), cminfty, cfv(cinftyexpi, cpi))
  df-bj-minfty()
  eqeq1i(cpinfty, cminfty, cfv(cinftyexpi, nat0))
  df-bj-pinfty()
}
blocks.pretty:
thm bj-pinftynminfty() {
  ⊢ pinfty ≠ minfty
} = {
  neir(cpinfty, cminfty)
  mtbir(pinfty = minfty, (inftyexpi ` 0)= minfty)
  mtbir((inftyexpi ` 0)= minfty, (inftyexpi ` 0)=(inftyexpi ` π))
  mtbi((inftyexpi ` 0)=(inftyexpi ` π), 0 = π)
  nesymi(nat0, cpi)
  gt0ne0ii(cpi)
  mp2an((0 = π ↔(inftyexpi ` 0)=(inftyexpi ` π)), 0 ∈(-u(π)[(,]]π), π ∈(-u(π)[(,]]π))
  mp2an(0 ∈(-u(π)[(,]]π), -u(π)∈ ℝ*, π ∈ ℝ)
  mpbir3and((-u(π)∈ ℝ* ∧ π ∈ ℝ), 0 ∈(-u(π)[(,]]π), 0 ∈ ℝ, -u(π)[<]0, 0[≤]π)
  0red((-u(π)∈ ℝ* ∧ π ∈ ℝ))
  a1i((-u(π)∈ ℝ* ∧ π ∈ ℝ), -u(π)[<]0)
  a1i((-u(π)∈ ℝ* ∧ π ∈ ℝ), 0[≤]π)
  ltleii(nat0, cpi)
  elioc2(-u(π), cpi, nat0)
  mp2an(π ∈(-u(π)[(,]]π), -u(π)∈ ℝ*, π ∈ ℝ)
  rexri(-u(π))
  mpbir3and((-u(π)∈ ℝ* ∧ π ∈ ℝ), π ∈(-u(π)[(,]]π), π ∈ ℝ, -u(π)[<]π, π[≤]π)
  simpr(-u(π)∈ ℝ*, π ∈ ℝ)
  a1i((-u(π)∈ ℝ* ∧ π ∈ ℝ), -u(π)[<]π)
  mp2an(-u(π)[<]π, -u(π)[<]0, 0[<]π)
  mpbi(-u(π)[<]0, 0[<]π)
  ax-mp((0[<]π ↔ -u(π)[<]0), π ∈ ℝ)
  lt0neg2(cpi)
  pipos()
  lttri(-u(π), nat0, cpi)
  renegcli(cpi)
  0re()
  a1i((-u(π)∈ ℝ* ∧ π ∈ ℝ), π[≤]π)
  leidi(cpi)
  pire()
  elioc2(-u(π), cpi, cpi)
  bj-inftyexpiinj(nat0, cpi)
  eqeq2i((inftyexpi ` 0), cminfty, (inftyexpi ` π))
  df-bj-minfty()
  eqeq1i(cpinfty, cminfty, (inftyexpi ` 0))
  df-bj-pinfty()
}

blocks.name: crrbar
blocks.content: Syntax for the set of extended real numbers.

blocks.name: df-bj-rrbar
blocks.content: Definition of the set of extended real numbers. This aims to replace ~ df-xr . (Contributed by BJ, 29-Jun-2019.)

blocks.name: cinfty
blocks.content: Syntax for ` infty ` .

blocks.name: df-bj-infty
blocks.content: Definition of ` infty ` , the point at infinity of the real or complex projective line. (Contributed by BJ, 27-Jun-2019.) The precise definition is irrelevant and should generally not be used. (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: ccchat
blocks.content: Syntax for ` CChat ` .

blocks.name: df-bj-cchat
blocks.content: Define the complex projective line, or Riemann sphere. (Contributed by BJ, 27-Jun-2019.)

blocks.name: crrhat
blocks.content: Syntax for ` RRhat ` .

blocks.name: df-bj-rrhat
blocks.content: Define the real projective line. (Contributed by BJ, 27-Jun-2019.)

blocks.name: bj-rrhatsscchat
blocks.content: The real projective line is included in the complex projective line. (Contributed by BJ, 27-Jun-2019.)
